item.title: TTM Variations
item.description: Over the years of trading TTM, I have made adjustments to increase returns or mitigate perceived risks. The flavors include: IRA Adjustments Risk Adjustments At-the-Money Exploitation Underlying Diversification Small Account Adjustments IRA Adjustments I first started trading TTM at eTrade in a TREG margin account. I left my 401K and IRA accounts untouched invested in index funds. After I became comfortable with the principles of TTM, I wanted to get the same benefits for trading in an IRA account.

item.title: About Tyler Jewell
item.description: I have worked in technology since 1991 where I had a part time QA and operations job for Banner Blue Software in Fremont, California. My QA was click-and-pray, but that exposed a fascintating industry. I later earned a Computer Science degree at Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology. I specialize in technology to make developers lives better. My career began as an unimpressive software engineer and later found success in evangelism, product management, and investments.

item.title: The Tyler Trading Method
item.description: Revisions 2/1/12 – First Draft 2/19/13 – Updates: Hedging precautions, rolling strategies 3/24/13 – Updates: Added examples 6/23/17 - Refresh Overview In 2011 I became ill and recovered 9 months later. At times I was uncertain whether I would heal. I fought a two front war: neutralizing attacks to my nervous system and battling anxiety that a long term disability could eliminate work opportunities. I began to obsess with finding ways to yield 10% regardless of a markets direction.
